data.scheme_name: Electricity Duty Exemption - Data Centres & Co-location facilities - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides 100% exemption from electricity duty for a period of 20 years.
data.eligibility: All existing data centre units which has gone into commercial production before date of commencement of the Policy are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. The unit must file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM) on the portal. 
  2. Electricity duty exemption applies only to power used for production; not for light load. 
  3. The unit must not be in the restrictive list as notified by the State Government. 
  4. The unit must obtain No objection certificate from the Competent Authority, if applicable. 
  5. The unit must be in commercial production.
data.beneficiaries: All existing data centre units which has gone into commercial production before date of commencement of the Policy are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The unit must file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM) on the portal. 
  2. Electricity duty exemption applies only to power used for production; not for light load. 
  3. The unit must not be in the restrictive list as notified by the State Government. 
  4. The unit must obtain No objection certificate from the Competent Authority, if applicable. 
  5. The unit must be in commercial production.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: Haryana Enterprises & Employment Policy-2020 is introduced for grant of “Electricity Duty Exemption” to the various sectors of Enterprises.
data.objective: To provide assistance to units in form of electricity duty exemption.
data.description: Scheme provides 100% exemption from electricity duty for a period of 20 years.
data.how_to_apply: Application on prescribed form for the grant of electricity duty exemption, along with the documents should be submitted to the Director/ Director General, Industries & Commerce/Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises through the web portal of the department.
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after the approval from the concerned auhtority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf 

Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828
Email-id deepakbura.etd@hry.gov.in
data.beneficiary: Specific Industry - All Entities - Haryana - All MSMEs and Non MSMEs
